channel.title: Error

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

From the looks of it when you made some commands you either put in to many spaces or deleted a letter. ive had this problem to and every time it happens go into your commands.java go to the line u coded and look at the line above it to make sure they all match spacesâ€¦ sometimes u accidently delete backslashes and periods. just make sure they all match up and you should be good if your error still occurs id advise you get a new source or get a pro to look at it

Hope this helped ya

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

Source; Dementhium 614.

Error:

src\org\dementhium\content\Commands.java:99: 'else' without 'if' else if (player.getDonator() == 1) { ^ 1 error Done Press any key to continue . . .
	[code]if (command[0].equals("yell")) {
		String yell = getCompleteString(command, 1);
		for(Player pl : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) {
			pl.sendMessage("[<img="+(player.getRights()==0?2:Player.getRights()-1)+">" + Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername()) + "]: " + yell);

		else if (player.getDonator() == 1) {
		pl.sendMessage("[<img=2>Donator]: " + yell);
		}	
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
